CustomField.description: Semaine date d√©but d'engagement de commande
CustomField.formula: IF(CEILING( ( Negoptim__SellInPreOrderBDate__c - DATE( YEAR( Negoptim__SellInPreOrderBDate__c ), 1, 1) + 1) / 7) > 52, 52, CEILING( ( Negoptim__SellInPreOrderBDate__c - DATE( YEAR( Negoptim__SellInPreOrderBDate__c ), 1, 1) + 1) / 7))
CustomField.label: Buy-in order week
